posts.title: React Router
posts.body: React Router is a collection of navigational components that compose declaratively with your application.

posts.title: React.js
posts.body: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is maintained by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies.

posts.title: React Hooks
posts.body: Hooks are a new addition in React 16.8. They let you use state and other React features without writing a class.

posts.title: React Context
posts.body: Context provides a way to pass data through the component tree without having to pass props down manually at every level.
